summary.para: Creates an instance of the from the provided unique device name.

param.name: pUniqueDeviceName
param.para: The unique device name of the device with which the sharing engine is created.

param.name: ppEngine
param.para: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
